name: Class CacheResponse
text:
Represent channels for retrieving resources from the
 ResponseCache. Instances of such a class provide an
 InputStream that returns the entity body, and also a
 getHeaders() method which returns the associated response headers.
codes:
public abstract class CacheResponse
extends Object

methods.method_sig:
public abstract Map<String, List<String>> getHeaders()
                                                   throws IOException
methods.description: Returns the response headers as a Map.

methods.method_sig:
public abstract InputStream getBody()
                             throws IOException
methods.description: Returns the response body as an InputStream.
